mapper.select: select O.order_no, T.today_time, T.total_price, T.status, B.branch_name, count(G.bm_no) count from burger_order O inner join today T on O.order_no=T.order_no inner join branch B on O.branch_no=B.branch_no inner join goods G on O.order_no=G.order_no where O.member_no=#{member_no} group by O.order_no, T.today_time, T.total_price, T.status, B.branch_name order by order_no desc

select G.count, M.menu_name,M.menu_price,M.category,P.save_name from goods G inner join branch_menu B on G.bm_no=B.bm_no inner join menu M on B.menu_no=M.menu_no inner join menu_photo P on M.menu_no=P.menu_no where G.order_no=#{order_no} and G.member_no=#{member_no} order by M.menu_no desc

select count(*) C from goods G inner join branch_menu B on G.bm_no=B.bm_no inner join menu M on B.menu_no=M.menu_no where G.order_no=#{order_no} and M.category=#{category} and G.member_no=#{member_no}
